juzs.text: khea klaw wa dangnan khwam munghmay khxng phwk than khux xari lea xo brrda thut xey
phwk khea klaw wa thæcring rea thuk sng mayang hmu chn phu kratha phid
pheux rea ca di yon kxn hin tha dwy din heniyw khæng lng bn phwk khea
thuk tra pen kheruxnghmay wi læw n thi phracea khxng cea sahrab phwk thi lameid khxbkhet
dangnan rea di na phu thi xyu nı meuxng nan cak hmu phu sraththa xxk ma hı phn
læa rea mi phb phu dı nı meuxng nan nxkcak ban hlang hnung khxng pwng phu nxbnxm
Læa rea di helux sayyan hnung wi sahrab brrda phu thi klaw tx kar lngthosʹ xan cebpwd
læa nı reuxng khx ngmu sa meux rea sng khea pi yang fir xean. Phrxm dwy hlakthan xan chad cæng
tæ fir xea nˌ di phin hlang xxk pi phrxm kab briwar khxng khea læw klaw (thung kar tha hnathi khx ngmu sa) wa nak lenkl hrux khn ba
dangnan rea di xea khea ma læa phirphl khxng khea læw rea di yon phwk khea lng pi nı thale læa taw khea k thuk pranam
læa nı reuxng khx ngxad meux rea di sng lm phayu thi thalay lang mayang phwk khea
man midi helux xari thing wi ley meux man di phad krahna ma nxkcak ni ca thahı sing nan phinas yxyyab
læa nı reuxng khxng sʹamud meux mi phu klaw kæ phwk khea wa phwk than cng snuk rareing pi chaw khna hnung theid
tæ phwk khea di thathay xohang tx phra baycha khxng phracea khxng phwk khea dangnan seiyng kampnath kdi khra chiwit phwk khea khna thi phwk khea cxng mxng du xyu
læw phwk khea mi samarth ca luk khun yun di læa phwk khea k mi samarth chwyhelux taw xeng di
læa hmu chn khxng nuh.Kxn hna ni thæcring phwk khea pen hmu chn thi fafun
læa chan fa rea di srang man dwy phrahatth khxng rea læa thæcring rea di phæ hı kwang phisal
læa phændin nan rea di phæ khyay man xxk pi dangnan rea pen phu phæ khyay thi yxd yeiym
læa cak thuk «sing nan rea di srang (man) khun pen khu «pheux phwk cea ca di khırkhrwy
dangnan phwk than cng rengrib pi ha xallxh. Thæcring chan pen phu takteuxn xyang peidphey cak phraxngkh kæ phwk than
læa phwk than xya tang phracea xun dı pen pha khi kab xallxh. Thæcring chan pen phu takteuxn xyang peidphey cak phraxngkh kæ phwk than
chen nan hæla mimi rx su l khn dı mayang brrda (hmu chn) kxn hna phwk khea wentæ phwk khea klaw wa pen nak lenkl hrux khn ba
phwk khea di sang seiy nı reuxng ni kæ kan kranan hrux? Pela ley! Tæwa phwk khea pen hmu chn phu lameid kein khxbkhet
Dangnan cea cng phin hlang xxk cak phwk khea theid læw cea ca mi pen phu thuk tahni
læa cng takteuxn theid pheraa thæcring kar takteuxn nan ca hı prayochn kæ brrda phu sraththa
læa kha mi di srang yin læa mnusʹy pheux xun dı wentæ pheux khearph phakdi tx kha
kha mi txngkar paccay yangchiph cak phwk khea læa kha k mi txngkar hı phwk khea hı xahar kæ kha
thæ cring xallxhˌ khux phu prathan paccay yangchiph xan mak hlay phuthrng phlang phuthrng mankhng
dangnan thæcring sahrab brrda phu praphvti phid nan khea ca di rab swn khxng kar lngthosʹ yeiyng swn kar lngthosʹ phwk pheuxn «khxng phwk khea dangnan phwk khea xya di rib reng hı kha (lngthosʹ) ley
dangnan khwam hayna ca prasb dæ brrda phu ptiseth sraththa nı wan khxng phwk khea sung di thuk sayya wi
khx saban tx phu khea xat tur
khx saban tx khamphir thi thuk caruk wi
nı mwn kradasʹ hrux hnang thi kang phæ
khx saban tx xakhar thi thuk yeuxn xyang smasemx
khx saban tx thxngfa thi xyu beuxng sung
khx saban tx thale thi luk chotichwng (nı wan ki ya mah)
thæcring kar lngthosʹ khxng phracea khxng cea ca keid khun xyang nænxn
mimi phu dı ca beiyng ben man di
wan thi chan fa ca san satheuxn xyang chulmun wunway
læa theuxkkhea ca pliw wxn kracadkracay
dangnan khwam hayna nı wan nan cng prasb kæ brrda phu ptiseth
brrda thi phwk khea xyu nı kar mawsum karlalen xyang ri sara
wan thi phwk khea ca thuk phlak lng nrk yahannam xyang phlak sı li sng
ni khux fi nrk sung phwk cea khey ptiseth man
ni khux leh kl hrux hrux wa phwk cea yang mxng mi hen
cng kheapi phea him nı nan phwk cea ca thn di hrux thn mi di k theatheiym kan sahrab phwk cea thæcring phwk cea nan ca thuk txbthæn tam thi phwk cea di kratha wi theanan
thæcring brrda phu yakerng nan ca di xyu nı swn swrrkh læa khwam sukh saray
Di rab khwam sukh xan lnphn tam thi phracea khxng phwk khea di prathan hı kæ phwk khea læa phracea khxng phwk khea ca khumkhrxng phwk khea hı phn cak kar lngthosʹ khxng pelw fi
phwk cea cng kin cng dum xyang sbaycı tam thi phwk cea di kratha wi
nxn xekkhenk xyu bn teiyng reiyng chid tid kan læa rea hı phwk khea mi khukhrxng pen hying saw swy dwngta to khm

læa brrda phu sraththa brrda luk hlan khxng phwk khea ca danein tamph wk khea dwy kar sraththa rea ca hı luk hlan khxng phwk khea xyu rwm kab phwk khea læa rea ca mi hıkar ngan khxng phwk khea ldhyxn lng cak phwk khea tæ xyang dı tæla khn yxm di rab kar khaprakan nı sing thi khea khwnkhway wi
læa rea ca pheimphun hı kæ phwk khea sung phl mi læa neux tam thi phwk khea txngkar
phwk khea ca lækpeliyn thwy kæw kan nı swrrkh ca mimi kar phudca tlkkhanxng læa mimi kar thabap
mi dek wayrun khxng phwk khea wnweiyn rab chı phwk khea semuxn wa phwk khea chen khimuk thuk pkpid wi
læa bang khnnı hmu phwk khea ca hanhnakheahakan sxbtham sung kanlæakan
phwk khea klaw wa thæcring tæ kxn ni (nı lok dun ya) phwk rea xyu kab khrxbkhraw khxng rea pen phu mi khwam wi tk kang wal
dangnan xallxh.Di thrng pordpran kæ rea læa di thrng pkpxng rea hı phn cak kar lngthosʹ hæng lm rxn
thæcring kxn hna ni rea di wingwxn tx phraxngkh thæcring phraxngkh nan pen phuthrng xeuxfeux pheuxphæ phuthrng metta semx
dangnan cng klaw teuxn (phwk khea theid) neuxng pheraa khwam pordpran hæng phracea khxng cea midi pen hor læa midi penba
hrux phwk khea klaw wa muhammad penk wi rea khxy phay phibati thi ca keid khun kæ khea
cng klaw theid muhammad phwk than cng khxy theid thæcring chan k ca xyu nı hmu phu khxy rwm kab phwk than
hrux wa stipayya khxng phwk khea chı phwk khea hı cheux chen nan hrux wa phwk khea pen hmu chn phu fafun
hrux phwk khea klaw wa khea di seksrr pan tæ ngxal ku rxa nkhun xeng pela dxk phwk khea mi sraththa tanghak
Dangnan phwk khea cng na kha klaw chen deiywkan ni ma hak phwk khea pen phu saty cring
hrux wa phwk khea thuk bangkeid ma doy mimi phu hı bangkeid hrux wa phwk khea pen phu hı bangkeid tnxeng
hrux wa phwk khea pen phu srang chan fa thanghlay læa phændin ni pela ley pheraa phwk khea mi cheux man tanghak
hrux wa phwk khea mi khumthraphy hæng phracea khxng cea hrux wa phwk khea pen phu mi xanac cadkar
hrux wa phwk khea mi bandi pheux phwk khea ca di fang reuxngraw tang «nı chan fa dangnan k cng hı khn thi fang nı hmu phwk khea na hlakthan xan chad cæng ma
hrux wa phraxngkh thrng mi butr hying hlay khn læa phwk cea mi butr chay hlay khn
hrux wa cea khx kha cang cak phwk khea dangnan phwk khea cung mi phara hni xan hnak
hrux wathi phwk khea mi sing renlab læw phwk khea k banthuk wi
hrux wa phwk khea txngkar thi ca wangphæn ray tæwa brrda phu ptiseth sraththa nan phwk khea tanghak thi ca thuk wangphæn ray
hrux wa phwk khea mi phracea xun ca kxallxh.Cak sing thi phwk khea tang phakhi
khran meux phwk khea hen sesʹ chin hnung rwng hln lng ma cak fak fa phwk khea k klaw wa man pen pheiyng kxn mekh rwm taw
dangnan cng plxy phwk khea theid cnkwa phwk khea ca phb kab wan khxng phwk khea sung nı wan nan phwk khea ca thuk thahı pen lm hmd sti
wan sung phæn karn ray khxng phwk khea ca mi xanwy prayochn xan dı kæ phwk khea læa phwk khea k ca mi di rab kar chwyhelux
læa thæcring sahrab brrda phu xthrrm nan ca di rab kar lngthosʹ xun cak nan xik tæwa swn mak khxng phwk khea miru
dangnan cng xdthn tx phra baycha khxng phracea khxng cea pheraa thæcring cea nan xyu nı beuxng sayta khxng rea læa cng sæsxng sdudi dwy kar srrseriy phracea khxng cea khna meux cea luk khun yun
læa swn hnung khxng klangkhun k cng sæsxng sdudi phraxngkh læa meux yam khlxng lab khxng hmu dwngdaw
khx saban dwy dwngdaw meux man khlxy tklng ma
Shay(muhammad) khxng phwk cea midi hlng phid læa cheux man nı thang thi phid
læa khea midi phud tam xarmn
xal ku rxa nmi chı xun dı nxkcak pen wa hiy.Thi thuk prathan lng ma
phuthrng phlang xanac xan makmay (yib ril) di sxn khea
phuthrng phlang xan khængræng dangnan khea cung prak d nı sphaph thithæ cring
khna thi khea xyu bn khxb fa xan sungsng
læw khea di khea ma kıl læa khea ma kıl cn chid
khea khea ma kıl (cn xyu) nı raya khxng play khan thnu thang sxng hrux kıl kwa nan xik
dangnan khea (yib ril) cung na wa hiyˌ ma hı kæ baw khxng phraxngkh (muhammad) sing thi khea ca na wa hiyˌ ma
citcı (khxng muhammad) midi ptiseth sing thi khea di hen
læw phwk cea ca totheiyng kab khea keiyw kab sing thi khea di hen xik hrux
læa doy nænxn khea di hen yib ril nı kar lng ma xik khrang hnung
n thi tn phuthth a xan kil phon
n thi nan khux swn swrrkh xanpen thi phanak
(khna nan) sing thi pkkhlum (sæng prakay) di pkkhlum tn phuthra
sayta (khxng muhammad) midi heluxb læ pi thang xun læa midi lwngkein pi
doy nænxn khea di hen sayyan xan ying hıy khxng phracea khxng khea
læw phwk cea mi di hen xal lat læa xal xus sa
læa taw xun khux taw thi sam, ma nat dxk hrux
sahrab phwk cea mi phes chay læa sahrab phraxngkh hı phes hying kranan hrux
dusi nan penkar bæng swn thi mi yutithrrm

hela ni michı xun dı nxkcak pen chux thi phwk cea læa brrphburusʹ khxng phwk cea tang man khun ma xeng xallxhˌ midi thrng prathan hlakthan xan dı lng ma keiyw kab reuxng nan ley phwk khea midi ptibati tam sing dı nxkcak kar khad khane læa sing thi xarmn prarthna læa doy nænxn næw thi thuk txng (hi da yahˌ) cak phracea khxng phwk khea di mi mayang phwk khea læw
hrux wa sahrab mnusʹy nan ca di thuk sing thi khea prarthna
(xanac nan) pen krrmsiththi khx ngxallxh.Thang nı prlok læa lok ni

Læa ma lak kimaknxy nı chan fa thanghlay nan ka rcha faxah.Khxng phwk khea ca mi xanwy prayochn xan dı (kæ phwk khea) wentæ hlang ca kxallxh.Ca thrng xnumati kæ phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh læa thrng phx phrathay
thæcring brrda phu thi mi sraththa tx wan prlok nan nænxn phwk khea ca tang chux ma la xik ahˌ pen phes hying
læa phwk khea mimi khwam ru nı reuxng nan ley phwk khea midi ptibati tam sing dı nxkcak kar khad khane læa thæcring kar khad khane nan ca mi xanwy prayochn xan dı kæ khwam cring di
dangnan cea cng hlb hlik hı hang cak phu thi phin hlangcak kar raluk nukthung rea (xallxh.) Læa khea midi prarthna xun dı nxkcak kar mi chiwit xyu nı lok ni theanan

nan khux sud yxd hæng khwam ru khxng phwk khea læw thæcring phracea khxng cea nan phraxngkh thrng ru di ying thung phu thi hlng xxk cak thang khxng phraxngkh læa phraxngkh thrng ru di ying thung phu thi xyu nı næwthang thi thuk txng (hi da yah)

læa sing thi xyu nı chan fa thanghlay læa sing thi xyu nı phændin nan pen krrmsiththi khx ngxallxhˌ pheux phraxngkh ca thrng txbthæn brrda phu kratha khwam chaw tam thi phwk khea praphvti læa ca thrng txbthæn brrda phu kratha khwam di dwy khwam di

kæ brrda phu hlik leiyng hang cak kar thabap hıy læa tha sing lamk thanghlay wentæ khwam phid phlad leknxy thæcring phracea khxng cea nan thrng pen phu kwangkhwang nı kar xphay phraxngkh thrng rucak phwk cea di ying meux khrang bangkeid phwk cea cak phændin læa meux khrang phwk cea pen thark xyu nı khrrph khxng marda khxng phwk cea dang phwk cea xya sædng khwam brisuththi kætaw khxng phwk cea xeng pheraa phraxngkh thrng ru di ying thung phu thi mi khwam yakerng
cea di hen phu thi phinhlanghı bang him
læa khea hı pheiyng leknxy læa khea di trahni (swn thi helux)
khea mi khwam ru nı sing renlab kranan hrux khea cung di hen
hrux wa khea midi rab khawkhraw thi mi xyu nı khamphir khx ngmu sa
Læa (nı khamphir khxng) xi brxhim phu sung ptibati tam sayya xyang khrbkhran
wa mimi phu bæk phara khn dı thi ca bæk phara khxng phu xun di
læa mnusʹy ca mi di xari ley nxkcak sing thi khea di khwnkhway xea wi
læa thæcring kar khwnkhway khxng khea k ca di hen nı mi cha
læw cea k ca di rab kar txbthæn dwy kar txbthæn thi khrbthwn smburn
læa thæcring cudhmayplaythang (khxng khea) yxm pi su phracea khxng cea
læa thæcring phraxngkh khux phuthrng thahı hawreaa læa thrng thahı rxnghi
læa thæcring phraxngkh khux phu thrng thahı tay læa thrng thahı pen
læa thæcring phraxngkh thrng srang sami phrrya khu hnung pen phes chay læa phes hying
cak cheux xsuci meux man hlang xxk ma
læa thæcring pen hnathi khxng phraxngkh thi ca hı bangkeid xik khrang hnung
læa thæcring phraxngkh thrng thahı khea rarwy læa thrng thahı khea yakcn
læa thæcring phraxngkh thrng pen phracea hæng daw si ri xus (xach cheiy axˌ rx)
læa thæcring phraxngkh thrng tha lay phwk xa dru nkxn «
læa phwk sʹamu dk mi di hı mi helux xyu xik ley
læa hmu chn khxng nu hkxn hna ni thæcring phwk khea pen phu xthrrm ying læa pen phu lameid ying
læa meuxng thi phlik khwa lng (xal mux.Ta fik ah.) Phraxngkh thrng hı man thlm lng
chanan sing thi khrxbkhlum man k (khux kar lngthosʹ) di khrxbkhlum man
dangnan khwam pordpran khxng phwk ceakhxng cea xan dı lea thi cea yang sngsay xyu
ni khux phu takteuxn thima cak pwng phu takteuxn run kxn «
wela thi kıl khea ma (wan ki ya mah) di kıl khea ma læw
mimi phu dı thi ca padpea hı phn pi di nxk ca kxallxhˌ
phwk cea yang khng pælk cı tx kha klaw ni xik hrux
læa phwk cea yang khng hawreaa læa yang mi rxnghi
læa phwk cea yang khng hlng rareing lumtaw
dangnan phwk cea cng suyu d tx xallxh.Theid læa cng khearph phakdi tx phraxngkh theid
wan ki ya mahˌ di kıl khea ma læw læa dwng canthr di yæk xxk
Læa hak phwk khea hen sayyan (patihariy) phwk khea k phinhlanghı læa klaw wa ni khux mayakl thi mi ma kxn læw
læa phwk khea di ptiseth læa ptibati tam xarmn fıta khxng phwk khea læa kickar thuk xyang yxm pen pi tam kahnd
læa doy nænxn di mi khawkhraw (nı xdit) mayang phwk khea læw sung nı nan mi khx takteuxn (kæ phwk khea)
(xalkurxan ni) pen hi kmahˌ xan luksung tæ kar takteuxn nan mi bangkeid phl (kæ phwk khea)
dangnan cea (muhammad) cng phinhlanghı kæ phwk khea wan sung phu reiyk rxng (xis rx fil) ca rxng reiyk pi su sing thi na klaw syxng khway
sayta khxng phwk khea ca ld ta lng khna thi phwk khea xxk cak ku bur semuxn hnung phwk khea pen taktæn thi bin wxn
rib wing pi yang phu reiyk rxng phwk ptiseth sraththa ca klaw wa wan ni pen wan thi labak ying
kxn hna phwk khea nan hmu chn khxng nuhˌ di ptiseth phwk khea di ptiseth baw khxng rea doy klaw wa khea (nuhˌ) pen khn ba læa thuk khu bangkhab
khea cung wingwxn khx tx phracea khxng khea wa thæcring kha phraxngkh thuk phichit seiy læw di pord chwyhelux(kha phraxngkh)dwy
dangnan rea cung di peid pratu hæng chan fa hı na fn the lng ma xyang hnak
læa rea di thahı phændin yæk xxk pen tana hil phung dangnan na fn læa tana di ma brrcb kan tam kickar thi di thuk kahnd wi læw
læa rea di brrthuk khea wi bn reux thi tha dwy phæn mi kradan læa txk tid dwy tapu
man (reux) di læn pi txhna rea (phay tı kar khumkhrxng khxng rea) penkar txbthæn kæ phu thi thuk ptiseth
læa doy nænxn rea di thing man wi pen sayyan hnung tæ mi phu dı bang thi rab khx takteuxn nan
dangnan kar lngthosʹ khxng rea læa kar takteuxn khxng rea pen chen dı bang
læa doy nænxn rea di tha hı xalkurxan ni pen thi kheacı ngay kæ kar raluk læw mi phu dı bang thi rab khx takteuxn nan
phwk xad di ptiseth dangnan kar lngthosʹ khxng rea læa kar takteuxn khxng rea pen chen dı bang
Thæcring rea di sng lm phayu thi hnaw henb pi yang phwk khea nı wan hæng khwam hayna thi tidtx kan
lm di phad krachak phukhn khlay kab wa phwk khea pentn xinthphlam thi thuk thxn xxk cak rak
dangnan kar lngthosʹ khxng rea læa kar takteuxn khxng rea pen chen dı bang
læa doy nænxn rea di tha hı xalkurxan ni pen thi kheacı ngay kæ kar raluk læw mi phu dı bang thi rab khx takteuxn nan
phwk sa mud di ptiseth phu takteuxn (rx sul khxng phwk khea)
phwk khea klaw wa khn thrrmda «cak phwk rea ni na hrux ca hı rea ptibati tam khea nænxn dangnan rea ca xyu nı kar hlng thang læa pen khn ba
sasn nan thuk sng ma hı kæ khea tæ phu deiyw xun cak phwk rea kranan hrux? Pela ley khea pen khn phud thec xwddi ri maryath
phrungni phwk khea ca di ru wa khır pen khn phud thec xwddi ri maryath
thæcring rea ca sng xuth tawmeiy taw hnung ma pheux penkar thdsxb kæ phwk khea dangnan (sx læa h) cng khxy du phwk khea læa cng xdthn
læa cng bxk phwk khea wa na nan thuk bæng swn rahwang phwk khea thuk «swn khxng na dum thuk cad wi læw
tæ phwk khea di rxng reiyk pheuxn khxng phwk khea khea di cab man kha dwy dab xyang tharun
dangnan kar lngthosʹ khxng rea læa kar takteuxn khxng rea pen chen dı bang
thæcring rea di sngseiyng kampnath pheiyng khrang deiyw lng bn phwk khea læw phwk khea klay pen chen sesʹ mi hæng
læa doy nænxn rea di tha hı xalkurxan ni pen thi kheacı ngay kæ kar raluk læw mi phu dı bang thi rab khx takteuxn nan
hmu chn khxng lut di ptiseth tx kar takteuxn
thæcring rea di sng phayu hin cak thxngfa lng bn phwk khea nxkcak wngs wa nkh xng lut rea di chwy phwk khea hı rxdphn nı yam rung sang
pen khwam pordpran cak rea chen nan hæla rea txbthæn phu ktayyu
læa doy nænxn khea (lut) di takteuxn phwk khea thung kar lngthosʹ khxng rea tæ phwk khea di toyæng khx takteuxn (khxng rea)

Læa doy nænxn phwk khea di khxrxng (kæm bangkhab) khea hı sng mxb khæk khxng khea (kæ phwk khea) dangnan rea cung thahı nay ta khxng phwk khea bxd lng chanan phwk cea cng lim rs kar lngthosʹ khxng rea læa kar takteuxn khxng rea
læa doy nænxn kar lngthosʹ xan tx neuxng kdi keid khun kæ phwk khea nı wela chea
chanan phwk cea cng lim rs kar lngthosʹ khxng rea læa kar takteuxn khxng rea
læa doy nænxn rea di tha hı xalkurxan ni pen thi kheacı ngay kæ kar raluk læa mi phu dı bang thi rab khx takteuxn nan
læa doy nænxn di mi kar takteuxn mayang wngs wa nkh xng fir xea n
phwk khea di ptiseth sayyan tang «khxng rea thanghmd dangnan rea cung di lngthosʹ phwk khea sung kar lngthosʹ hæng phuthrng xanac phuthrng xanuphaph
phwk ptiseth sraththa khxng phwk cea ca di ying kwa phwk hela nan kranan hrux? Hrux wa mi kar ykwen thosʹ sahrab phwk cea rabu wi nı khamphir
hrux phwk khea klaw wa phwk rea thanghmd nan pen phu chna

phraxngkh khux phra phuthrng srang chan fa thanghlay læa phændin nı raya 6 wan læw phraxngkh thrng sthity xyu bn ballangk phraxngkh thrng rxbru sing thi kheapi nı phændin læa sing thi xxk ma cak phændin læa sing thi lng ma cak fak fa læa sing thi khun pi su fak fa læa phraxngkh thrng xyu kab phwk cea mi wa phwk cea ca xyu n hæng hn dı læa xallxh.Thrng hen sing thi phwk cea kratha

phwk cea cng sraththa tx xallxh. Læa rx sul khxng phraxngkh læa cng bricakh nı thang khx ngxallxh cak sing thi phraxngkh thrng thahı phwk cea pen tawthæn khxng man dangnan brrda phu sraththa læa brrda phu bricakh nı hmu phwk cea nan sahrab phwk khea ca di rab rangwal xan hıy ying

læa chin lea phwk cea cung mi sraththa tx xallxh. Thang «thi rx sul di reiyk rxng phwk cea hı sraththa tx phracea khxng phwk cea læa nænxn phraxngkh di thrng xea sayya kab phwk cea læw hak phwk cea pen phu sraththa

phraxngkh pen phuthrng prathan br rdaxal xa ya txan chad cæng lng ma kæ (muhammad) baw khxng phraxngkh pheux thrng na phwk cea xxk cak khwam mud thanghlay su khwam swang læa thæ cring xallxhˌ nan pen phuthrng xendu phuthrng metta semx tx phwk cea

Læa chin lea phwk cea cung mi bricakh nı thang khx ngxallxhˌ thang «thi mrdk hæng chan fa thanghlay læa phændin ni pen khx ngxallxhˌ nı hmu phwk cea nan mi phu bricakh læa di txsu (nı thang khx ngxallxhˌ) kxn kar phichit(nkhr mak kahˌ) chn hela nan yxm mi thana sungsng kwa brrda phu bricakh læa txsu(nı thang khx ngxallxhˌ) hlang kar phichit(nkhr mak kahˌ) læa xallxhˌ thrng sayya khwam di ngam (swn swrrkh) kæ thang sxng fay læa xallxhˌ nan thrng rxbru xyang laxeiyd nı sing thi phwk cea kratha
khır khux phu thi ca hı xallxhˌ yum (bricakh nı thang khx ngxallxhˌ) dwy kar yum thi di læw phraxngkh k ca thrng pheimphun phl buy kæ khea læa khea ca di rab rangwal xan mi keiyrti (swn swrrkh)

wan thi cea ca hen brrda phu sraththa chay læa brrda phu sraththa hying sængswang khxng phwk khea ca chay sæng n beuxnghna khxng phwk khea læa thang beuxng khwa khxng phwk khea (ca miseiyng klaw wa) wan ni mi khawdi kæ phwk cea khux swn swrrkh hlakhlay mi mæna hlay say hil phan n beuxng lang khxng man doy phanak xyu nı nan tlxd kal nan khux chaychna xan ying hıy

wan thi phwk mu na fiki n chay læa phwk mu na fiki n hying ca klaw kæ brrda phu sraththa wa cng mxng mayang rea theid pheux rea ca di rab sængswang khxng phwk than dwy ca miseiyng klaw wa cng han hlang klab pi thang khang hlang khxng phwk cea pheux sæwngha xea xeng (khna nan) k ca mi kaphæng thi mi pratu ban hnung ma khwang kan rahwang phwk khea dan nı khxng man nan mi khwam metta læa dan nxk khxng man (khxng phwk mu na fiki n) mi kar lngthosʹ

Phwk khea (phwk mu na fiki n) ca rxng reiyk khea thanghlay (br rda muxˌ mi nin) wa phwk rea midi khey xyu rwm kab phwk than dxk hrux? Khea thanghlay klaw wa nænxn tæ phwk than di thalay taw khxng phwk than dwy kark lab klxk læa phwk than khxy sing thi keid khun (kæ br rda muxˌ mi nin) læa phwk than sngsay (nı reuxng khxng sasna) læa khwam hwang thi leuxnlxy di hlxklwng phwk than cnkrathang phra baycha khx ngxallxhˌ di mi ma læa man (chay dxn) di lxlwng phwk cea keiyw kab xallxhˌ

dangnan wan ni kar thibap ca mi thuk rab cak phwk cea læa cak brrda phu ptiseth sraththa thi phanak khxng phwk cea khux fi nrk man pen sthan thi xan hemaasm kæ phwk cea læa man pen thang klab thi chaw ray ying

yang mi thung wela xik hrux sahrab brrda phu sraththa thi hawcı khxng phwk khea ca nxbnxm tx kar ra luk thung xallxhˌ læa sing sung di mi lng ma khux khwam cring læa phwk khea xya di pen chen brrda phu di rab khamphir ma tæ kxn ni læw chwng wela di neinnan keinpi kæ phwk khea dangnan citcı khxng phwk khea cung khæng kradang læa swn mak khxng phwk khea cung pen phu fafun

phung thrab theid wa thæ cring xallxh nan thrng hı phændin mi chiwitchiwa hlangcak kar hænglæng khxng man nænxn rea di thahı sayyan thanghlay cæmcæng kæ phwk cea læw pheux phwk cea ca di chı stipayya khırkhrwy

thæcring brrda phu bricakh chay læa brrda phu bricakh hying læa phwk khea di hı xallxh yum (bricakh nı hnthang khx ngxallxh) dwy kar yum thi di ca mi pheim (phl buy) kæ phwk khea læa sahrab phwk khea ca di rab rangwal xan mi keiyrti

læa brrda phu sraththa tx xallxh. Læa brrda rx sul khxng phraxngkh chn hela nan phwk khea pen phu saty cring læa pen phu seiysla chiwit n thi phracea khxng phwk khea sahrab phwk khea ca di rab rangwal khxng phwk khea læa sængswang khxng phwk khea swn brrda phu ptiseth sraththa læa ptiseth sayyan tang «khxng rea chn hela nan pen chaw nrk

Phung thrab theid wa thæcring kar mi chiwit xyu nı lok ni michı xun dı wentæ penkarlalen læa kar snuksnan rareing læa kheruxngpradab læa khwam xoxwd rahwang phwk cea læa kar khængkhan kan sasm nı thraphysin læa luk hlan periyb semuxn chen na fn thi kar ngxkngey phuch phl yang khwam phxcı hı kæ ksikr læw man k heiywhæng cea ca hen man pen si heluxng læw man k klay pen sesʹ pen chin hæng swn nı wan prlok nan mi kar lngthosʹ xyang sahas læa mi kar xphaythosʹ læa khwam pordpran ca kxallxh læa kar mi chiwit xyu nı lok ni michı xun dı nxkcak kar sæwngha phl prayochn hæng kar hlxklwng theanan

cng rengrib pi su kar khxxphay thosʹ cak phracea khxng phwk cea læa swn swrrkh sung khwam kwang khxng man prahnung khwam kwang khxng chan fa læa phændin (sung swrrkh nan) thuk teriym wi sahrab brrda phu sraththa tx xallxhˌ læa brrda rx sul khxng phraxngkh nan khux khwam pordpran khx ngxallxhˌ sung phraxngkh ca thrng prathan man hı kæ phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh læa xallxhˌ nan thrng pen phu pordpran xan hıy hlwng
mimi kheraah krrm xan dı keid khun nı phændin ni læa mimi mætæ nı taw khxng phwk cea xeng wentæ di mi wi nı banthuk kxn thi rea ca bangkeid man khun ma thæcring nan man penkar ngay sahrab xallxh

pheux phwk cea ca di mi txng seiycı tx sing thi di suy seiy pi cak phwk cea læa mi dicı tx sing thi phraxngkh thrng prathan kæ phwk cea læa xallxh mi thrng chxb thuk phu hying cxnghxng læa phu khuy wo xoxwd
khux brrda phu thi trahni læa sangsxn khn xun hı trahni læa phu thi phinhlanghı thæ cring xallxhˌ nan phraxngkh thrng phx pheiyng læa thrng di rab kar srrseriy xyang nænxn

Doy nænxn rea di sng brrda rx sul khxng rea phrxm dwy hlakthan thanghlay xan chad cæng læa rea di prathan khamphir læa khwam yutithrrm lng ma phrxm kab phwk khea pheux mnusʹy ca di darng xyu bn khwam theiyngthrrm læ rea di hı mi helk khun ma pheraa nı nan mi khwam khængkærng mak læa mi prayochn mak hlay sahrab mnusʹy læa pheux xallxhˌ ca di thrng ru thung phu thi chwyhelux phraxngkh læa brrda rx sul khxng phraxngkh (mi khwam cheux man) doy thang lab (tx phraxngkh) thæ cring xallxhˌ nan pen phuthrng phlang phuthrng xanac

(khx saban dwy phranam khx ngxallxhˌ) doy nænxn rea di sng nuhˌ læa xi brxhim læa rea di thahı luk hlan khxng khea thang sxng pen nabi læa rea di prathan khamphir (xat tea rxhˌ xas sa bur xal xin yil læa xalkurxan) dangnan bang khnnı hmu phwk khea k pen phu xyu nı næwthang thi thuk txng læa swn mak nı hmu phwk khea k pen phu fafun hlng thang

læw rea kdi sng brrda rx sul khxng rea tidtam rxngrxy khxng phwk khea læa rea di sng xi sa xi bnˌ maryam tam ma læa rea di pra tha nxinyil hı kæ khea læa rea di bandal khwam sngsar læa khwam metta hı keid khun nı citcı khxng brrda phu thi cheuxfang ptibati tam khea swn kar thux sandosʹ nan rea midi bayyati man khun ma kæ phwk khea (wentæ) phwk khea pradisʹth man khun ma pheux sæwngha khwam pordpran khx ngxallxhˌ tæ phwk khea midi xeacısı thea thi khwr ca kratha man kranan k di rea kdi prathan rangwal khxng phwk khea kæ brrda phu sraththa nı hmu phwk khea tæ swn mak khxng phwk khea pen phu fafun

xo br rd phu sraththa xey cng ya ke rng tx xallxh læa cng sraththa tx rx sul khxng phraxngkh theid phraxngkh ca thrng prathan khwam metta khxng phraxngkh hı kæ phwk cea sxng thea læa ca thrng hı mi sængswang kæ phwk cea pheux phwk cea ca di danein chiwit dwy man læa ca thrng xphaythosʹ hı kæ phwk cea læa xallxh nan pen phuthrng xphay phuthrng metta semx

Thangni pheux hı xah lu lki tab ca di ru wa phwk khea mimi xanac henux sing dı nı khwam pordpran khx ngxallxh læa thæcring khwam pordpran khx ngxallxh læa thæcring khwam pordpran nan xyu nı ngeuxm phra hatth khx ngxallxh sung phraxngkh ca thrng prathan khwam pordpran nan kæ phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh læa xallxh pen phuthrng pordpran xan hıy hlwng
